value.title: StarCraft 2: Legacy of the Void - How-to Come Back in Zerg vs Protoss! (Zerg Tutorial)
value.excerpt: Coming back in Zerg versus Protoss in StarCraft 2: Legacy of the Void can be rather difficult. However, in a lot of scenarios you can take a risk when you know you are behind and come back to an advantage. value.title: StarCraft 2: Legacy of the Void - Liberator Spotlight! (4K)
value.excerpt: The Liberator got added to StarCraft 2: Legacy of the Void. This unit will be the last unit added to StarCraft 2 and is available as a Starport unit for Terran in the Legacy of the Void expansion.  The unit can be created out of a Starport without an addon and can be produced two at a time with a reactor,
